tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent world class facilities at this clinic. *** ******** ** ******* * ***** *** **** ******* * **** ************ He has a nimble touch while treating either fillings, root canal or crown/bridge, giving anaesthesia* ********* ************* *** * *************. Smile Sculptors is armed with the latest digital technology. I went for RCT / bridge and must say his guidance and insights on the treatment procedure is extremely honest and long term oriented. His staff Dr. Ritwika came across as a very polite, helpful and knowledgeable doctor. The clinic is extremely hygienic , well equipped and well maintained keeping all covid norms in mind. Dr. Supreeth is a very detailed , perfection driven and a comforting dentist. The entire RCT treatment went almost painless and Dr. Supreeth gives a lot of confidence and encouragement to make the entire dental experience smooth. My wife also got her tooth fillings done and her experience has been similar. By far , Dr. Supreeth and his staff and smile Sculptors clinic deserves more than 5 stars and is highly recommended for any sort of dental treatment. Anyone can be rest assured of the quality of treatment and advise given at this clinic. I am very satisfied that I got my tooth problems addressed at this place. It's a technology driven dental clinic with latest medical equipments and a very talented team led by a well qualified and extremely experienced  gentleman and down to earth Dr. Supreeth.
reply_text:
That was a detailed observation which u have put forward.. many thanks for motivating words. Team always looks forward for understanding people like u. Many thanks 
- team smile sculptors-

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Dr. Supreeth at his dental practice for a cavity, which was bothering me for a year.  I was very impressed with the level of care and expertise he provided. From the moment I walked into the office, I felt welcomed and at ease, thanks to the friendly staff and comfortable waiting area.

During my appointment, Dr. Supreeth took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the procedure and answer any questions I had. His attention to detail and gentle touch made me feel completely at ease, and I left the clinic feeling confident in my dental health.

Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Supreeth and his team to anyone in need of a skilled and compassionate dentist. Their dedication to patient care is truly exceptional, and I look forward to returning for my next appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The cure for any health issue begins, when the patient understands the complexity of the issue. Dr. Supreeth is knowledgeable and extremely patient in explaining the basics of dental health and the issues at length. I had a bad root canal done elsewhere and I needed to sort the issue. He spent lot of time explaining the dental condition and it helped me to make an informed decision. If anyone wishes to meet a Dentist who has patience to listen and explain the situation and treatment options, Dr. Supreet is the answer. I would rename him as Dr. Super Hit, if I could. The clinic is neat, hygenic and provides as a calm ambience, unlike the feel of a public place. *** ****** ** *** ** *** **** **** * **** **** ****** ** ********** 7 Stars from me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Just amazing experience with doctor Supreeth and his super team.

They are always focused and at the same time have a good time with their patients.

I really appreciate the time and effort doctor Supreeth took for my teeth , root canals and in the end crowning.

I never felt disappointed even once when I visit their clinic, it’s nice and well maintained. Not long waiting time .

Accurately pin point the issue and treat them is best what they do.

Overall I really recommended anyone to come here for any kind of dental treatment. You won’t be disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Supreeth was amazing. I visited his clinic for my cavity filling and was a little worried when I found out that I had 6 deep cavities. But Dr Supreeth immediately put to me ease with his skills and techniques. He and his team were extremely efficient in their treatment and ability to also educate me about my wisdom tooth problems. My father also had a lot of tooth issues and after multiple visits and treatments is completely fine and is singing the praises for the doctor and his team. 

I would highly recommend this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Tooth Filling,
review: I had many dental issues from past year and was worried to visit dentist due to the covid suituation. But I am glad that I visited Dr. Supreeth. He is  extreamly skilled, expirienced and humble. They follow every covid protocol very strictly which gives us a safe feeling. Dr. Supreeth takes utmost care and he explained patiently about the problems I had and the best solutions for it before the treatment. The whole team is very friendly and made me feel comfortable throughout the treatment. I highly recomment Smile Sculptors for all dental related issues. Thank you for the whole team!
reply_text: Thank u very much for the motivating words and keen observations ... Such words make us feel motivated to perform better .. many tthanks

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * **** ** **** ** *** ********Please never visit this clinic. ***** **** **** ** ** **** ***** ******* ** *** **** ** **** ******* I had very bad experience yesterday when I went for second visit. In my first appointment they had not shared the exercise techniques *** *** **** ****** **** ** **** **** ** **** *** * ***** **** **** ** **** **** ** ******* **** *********** ** ******* **** ** **** *** ********* the exercise they done om me still hurting me badly after 1 day. ******** ** ****** **** ********* *** *********** ** *** ****** *** *******
reply_text:
The TMJ issue is not an overnight issue which can be treated in 2 days and protocols of management comes with a plan. 

The plan proposed to u was not accepted by u and were relying mostly on self diagnosis.

The detailed structural plan proposed regarding diet , posture , exercises were management only and deprogrammer would be treatment. 
As mentioned that TMJ issue can be sorted out over a period of time and not overnight. 
Have patience for a complete recovery and please do visit a TMJ specialist for a better recovery.

“ self diagnosis is detrimental to your own health “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to Smile Sculptors clinic to consult my mother's dental problems . She was suffering from severe tooth ache and various other dental  problems related to her age. We are very pleased  with the way the treatment was handled. As we were concerned that she is having other health problems and on top there is this difficult covid19  situation.  We noticed that the clinic and staffs are well equipped to deal with this Covid19 situation. ******** ** ******** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ****** ** **********  He is highly qualified and holds a PHD degree . We were very impressed  the way the problem was described  and treated.  Thank you Dr. Supreeth ! Really appreciate and feeling fortunate to be landed in your clinic :-) Regards, Ashish
reply_text: Thank u very much for kind words and we are keeping a close check on your moms oral status..

review: Dr.Supreeth and his clinic staff were extremely helpful to completely resolve the issue of a replacement for a bracket for my fixed orthodontic appliance

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visiting due to headache, took pain and cheek pain .I thought it was due to my growing wisdom teeth. doctor did a xray and said that one of my teeth is having infection and we couldn't figure out coz I was a little confused with affecting teeth for the pain. he suggested root canal. I wasn't sure as we couldn't 100% figure out which teeth was infected. I asked for some antibiotics. he suggested for mild ones so that there will be not false hopes on getting cured completely on antibiotics. I took only 1 pain killer that night and mild antibiotics for a week. and it's been more than 2 weeks and I donot feel any pain. i suggest anyone in my place to take a step back from operations and give it a try with antibiotics. i consulted another family doc via phone who is far from us . we shared the xray and he dint mention any infection visible from the xray results. so I was a little confused on why this doctor suggested me the root canal. Nevertheless, I will hold on until there is reoccurrance of the pain and consult any other doctor before going back to this doctor for root canal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Supreeth Manipal he takes utmost care and makes sure that the patient is comfortable before he starts the procedure. Most of the healing happens when a doctor spends time with the patient and explain s the problem and cure. He has great experience I am undergoing treatment there. I was Referred by my neice, I would recommend Dr Supreeth Manipal to my family and friends...Not to forget the staff they are also great very polite and humble.... The clinic is neat and hygienic....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Supreeth is extremely professional. I am extremely grateful for having found his clinic for my dental treatment. All my fillings, extraction and crown was done fast and with almost no pain. 

There is just one problem that I faced - the amount of waiting and non availability of the staff to give clear picture of how long the wait would be .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Supreeth is very professional and knows his job perfectly. He explaines each and every details and help you understand the importance of dental health. So, happy I consulted him regarding my braces and my husband gums problem. I would happily recommend him to my friends and family.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The experience with the Doctor was pleasant. He went through explaining the problem systematically and also performed the procedure with least discomfort.
The clinic was impeccable and I am sure the most of the people visiting the clinic will agree with me.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Had very good experience with Dr Supreeth.
Excellent and appropriate explanation of the problem, diagnosis and treatment. 
The procedure was carried out with excellent care and precision.
All the Doctors at SmileSculptors are also very good.
I liked the fact that the doctor gives the right advise for the long term and the effort is to protect the natural tooth of the customer as the primary choice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After trying a few dental clinics in jp nagar,  we at last found a doctor who is not only brilliant but also ethical.  *** ******* ** * **** ** ***** ************ *** always keeps the interest of the patient in mind while suggesting a line of treatment.  We have now shifted residence to a place which is 90kms away but still travel to this clinic because of our trust in him!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Strongly recommend this clinic and this team of doctors for anyone who needs a  dental care. Have undergone RCT and other dental fillings. The entire team is very polite and humble. Dr. Supreet explains the procedure that  needs to be followed in detail. Made me feel at ease the whole time. Don’t give a second thought to visit them if you need a dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had gone to the doctor with severe pain after extaction of 3 teeth from lower right jaw. Dr.Sooraj from Madurai(who is the consultant to my daughter) recommended Dr.Supreeth.
He did a wonderful job of cleaning and restiching an explaining the problem ,enhancing my confidence though I had to bear severe pain.He imparted confidence and comfort and explained the process and recovery. Highly satisfied and hope by next visit my problems will ease.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am really thankful to have come across this amazing Doc Supreeth!..He took the the time and patiently explained the case to me before proceeding with the treatment. The extraction procedure was carried out swiftly and made me feel at ease the whole time!. A special thanks to Dr. Tasneem and Dr.Ritika who also contributed to the procedures and following up on post Operative care!!..HIGHLY RECOMMEND  smile sculptors for everything dental related!!!.. thanks so much!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The clinic is safeguarded because of virus. Also doctors adhere for covid regulations for themselves and the patients. They adhere to the appointed time, explain procedure very clearly and carry on the treatment with a very clinical efficiency. I really salute the whole team and recommend them in case of need to any known person,friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Supreeth had a very professional and humble approach in first explaining the situation to us in a very simple and precise way, which not only put to rest any questions we had about the problem but also helped us understand his course of treatment. The treatment that followed has been again precise and to the best of our satisfaction.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I was having acute pain and requested for an urgent appointment.
I was apprehensive in visiting a doctor clinic in these Covid time.The clinic was spotlessly clean and disinfected before I entered the doctor chamber.
The team was very friendly and the doctor spent considerable time in explaining the problem to me.
The treatment went very well and I was happy to have visited Dr. Supreeth.
I would recommend Dr. Supreeth to any person who has a dental problem.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for a tooth filling for my daughter. Hygiene and all covid19 safety protocols were adhered to. Friendly doctor and his assistant made my daughter feel at ease the moment we stepped in. Further, after detailed examination of all teeth, not just the painful one, and treatment as necessary, doctor explained the milk teeth and permanent teeth structures, what care should be taken and what to expect in the coming years. At this stage, I somehow felt that I will be charged a bomb, but surprisingly, the fee was nominal.
Very happy with the experience.
reply_text: Thank u for the appreciation.. humbled with ur words...

review: Incidentally It has been family affair for us. I happened to visit the Dr Supreeth  for my RCT  nd filling. My experience regarding the treatment was very  satisfactory as I went there  with severe pain the entire team of dr were really amazing and made me feel very  comfortable. Thereafter my daughter nd my husband got treatment from the same team. We all are very happy nd highly recommend this clinic.
reply_text: Thank you for the encouraging words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Supreeth was very patient and educative. He took time to calm my frayed nerves. He assured me that he would take the best possible route to ensure a smooth and painless extraction. He was very sensitive to my medical conditions.. explained all possibilities before starting the procedure.  Before and after care was excellent because he sends videos with exactly the right information.
Overall a great experience.
reply_text: Thank u for the humble words and we the whole team of smile sculptors is happy that u had a great experience with us. God bless u
